statements: SELECT * FROM microbiome_data;
SELECT sample_id, patient_id FROM microbiome_data WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT bacteria_name, abundance FROM microbiome_data WHERE abundance > 0.5 ORDER BY abundance DESC;
SELECT AVG(abundance) AS average_abundance FROM microbiome_data;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id FROM microbiome_data ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM microbiome_data WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY abundance DESC;
SELECT bacteria_name, SUM(abundance) AS total_abundance FROM microbiome_data GROUP BY bacteria_name HAVING total_abundance > 10;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(DISTINCT bacteria_name) AS num_unique_bacteria FROM microbiome_data GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT * FROM microbiome_data WHERE abundance BETWEEN 0.1 AND 0.5 ORDER BY patient_id;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS num_samples FROM microbiome_data GROUP BY patient_id ORDER BY num_samples DESC;
SELECT * FROM microbiome_samples ORDER BY sample_date DESC;
SELECT sample_id, bacteria_name, abundance FROM microbiome_samples WHERE abundance > 0.5;
SELECT bacteria_name, SUM(abundance) AS total_abundance FROM microbiome_samples GROUP BY bacteria_name;
SELECT sample_id, bacteria_name, abundance FROM microbiome_samples WHERE sample_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM microbiome_predictions ORDER BY prediction_date ASC;
SELECT sample_id, bacteria_name, abundance, sample_date FROM microbiome_samples WHERE sample_id = 1
SELECT * FROM microbiome_samples WHERE abundance > 0.5 ORDER BY sample_date DESC
SELECT bacteria_name, SUM(abundance) AS total_abundance FROM microbiome_samples GROUP BY bacteria_name HAVING total_abundance > 10

SELECT s.sample_id, s.bacteria_name, p.predicted_abundance, p.prediction_date FROM microbiome_samples s INNER JOIN microbiome_predictions p ON s.sample_id = p.sample_id WHERE p.predicted_abundance < 0.2
SELECT DISTINCT bacteria_name FROM microbiome_samples ORDER BY bacteria_name ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM microbiome_composition;
SELECT sample_id, species_name, abundance FROM microbiome_composition WHERE abundance > 50;
SELECT collection_date, location FROM sample_metadata ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT sample_id, predicted_species, probability FROM prediction_results WHERE probability >= 0.8 ORDER BY probability DESC;
SELECT predicted_species, COUNT(predicted_species) AS predictions_count FROM prediction_results GROUP BY predicted_species ORDER BY predictions_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM microbiome_composition ORDER BY abundance DESC, species_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT species_name, SUM(abundance) AS total_abundance FROM microbiome_composition GROUP BY species_name HAVING total_abundance > 100 ORDER BY total_abundance DESC;
SELECT sample_id, location, collection_date FROM sample_metadata WHERE location IN ('Location A', 'Location B') ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM prediction_results WHERE probability > 0.8 ORDER BY probability DESC, sample_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT p.sample_id, p.predicted_species, m.location FROM prediction_results p INNER JOIN sample_metadata m ON p.sample_id = m.sample_id WHERE m.location = 'Location C';
SELECT * FROM microbiome_samples;
SELECT sample_id, barcode, species FROM microbiome_samples WHERE date_collected >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(sample_id) AS sample_count FROM microbiome_samples;
SELECT genotype, phenotype FROM microbiome_metadata WHERE sample_id = 3;
SELECT model, predicted_species, prediction_date FROM microbiome_predictions ORDER BY prediction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM microbiome_samples WHERE sample_id = 1;
SELECT species, abundance FROM microbiome_composition WHERE sample_id = 3 ORDER BY abundance DESC;
SELECT barcode, sequence FROM microbiome_samples WHERE species = 'Bacteria' AND date_collected >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT genotype, phenotype FROM microbiome_metadata WHERE sample_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM microbiome_predictions WHERE model = 'Random Forest' ORDER BY prediction_date DESC;
SELECT sample_id, date_collected, bacteria_species, abundance FROM microbiome_samples;
SELECT * FROM patient_metadata WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT bacteria_species, phylum, class FROM microbiome_taxonomy ORDER BY phylum, class;
SELECT prediction_id, predicted_species, confidence_level FROM microbiome_predictions WHERE confidence_level > 0.8;
SELECT factor_name, description FROM environmental_factors WHERE factor_name LIKE '%temperature%';
SELECT * FROM microbiome_samples WHERE date_collected = '2022-01-15';
SELECT patient_name, age, location FROM patient_metadata WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT bacteria_species, phylum, genus FROM microbiome_taxonomy WHERE phylum = 'Firmicutes';
SELECT factor_name, description FROM environmental_factors WHERE LENGTH(description) > 100;
SELECT * FROM microbiome_predictions WHERE predicted_species LIKE '%Bacteroides%' AND confidence_level > 0.8 ORDER BY confidence_level DESC;
